member.summary: library format: 1:(s as string,loc as integer (one or more, splited with '.'),rank as integer>=1) 2:(s as string,pro as string,ton as integer, loc(the same as 1),rank as integer)

member.name: M:Chinese_Recite.Zoom.setTag(System.Object)
member.summary: If you want to use the auto zoom function in your object you should first add the sub 'zoomInitialize' to Load sub (sender is 'Me') then add the sub 'setcontrols' to the event {form_name}_Resize Good Luck! Jan 24, 2020 ,By Zheng Huang
